event.title: Fellowship meeting in Düsseldorf, Germany
event.body: Next regular Fellowship meeting in Düsseldorf will take take place on 30th September, at 19:30 in Chaosdorf (Hüttenstr. 25, 40215 Düsseldorf). Wolf-Dieter Zimmermann, the frequent participant of our meetings, will speak about promoting Free Software in Mülheim/Ruhr. The "official" part will start at 20:00. Guests are always welcome!
